venue.address_1: near Meriden Mall ( will give address to RSVP's the day before)
venue.name: Brett's House

item.description:
ANY QUESTIONS CALL BRETT'S CELL PHONE 203-651-9166

Good Ole' Fashioned Bonfire.  - Good Friends, Good Drinks, Good  Times

I'll be providing the marshmallows, all the firewood we can burn, and Brett's Wild Party Punch! So dig out your folding Camp Chair and Join us. I'll be making burgers  on the grill for anyone who comes before dark.  People are encouraged to bring additional alcohol.
item.name: Fall Kick Off Bon Fire !!
